channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (short_term)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Yo La Tengo @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2025-12-29 04:00 → 2026-01-01 05:00 — Yo La Tengo at The Fillmore. The collaboration with Luna adds to the excitement, promising a unique experience at The Fillmore.

item.title: Goldford @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2026-01-15 04:00 — Goldford at The Fillmore. GoldFord's tour is generating buzz, and performing at The Fillmore enhances the appeal.

item.title: ONEW @ San Jose Civic
item.description: 2026-01-10 03:30 — ONEW at San Jose Civic. ONEW's world tour is attracting attention, making this show a notable event in San Jose.

item.title: Paul Cauthen @ The Independent

item.title: TWICE @ Oakland Arena

item.title: Bad Omens @ Oakland Arena
item.description: 2026-03-28 02:00 — Bad Omens at Oakland Arena. Say She She's tour is generating buzz, and their performance at August Hall is highly anticipated.

item.title: Dark Star Orchestra @ Fox Theater - Oakland
item.description: 2026-02-07 03:30 — Dark Star Orchestra at Fox Theater - Oakland. Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit are known for their compelling live performances, making this show a highlight.

item.title: Van Morrison @ Palace of Fine Arts
item.description: 2026-02-19 03:00 → 2026-02-20 03:00 — Van Morrison at Palace of Fine Arts. Madison Cunningham's rising profile and unique sound make her show at Bimbo's 365 Club appealing.

item.title: Dave @ Fox Theater - Oakland

item.title: Sam Smith @ The Castro Theatre
